summary: An ordinance relating to Condemnation Award District No. 4721 (Denny Hill Regrade No. 2); providing for the call of all outstanding bonds therein; increasing a 1945 budget item and appropriating $700,000.00 for such purpose from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor; transferring such sum from the surplus in the General Fund as an advance and loan; providing for the repayment of said loan and making an appropriation to the District Fund.
